name: Pond Minnow
description: A tiny freshwater fish. Barely a mouthful, but every bit of sustenance counts in these dark times.

name: River Trout
description: A decent-sized freshwater fish with firm flesh. A welcome sight after days of foraging for scraps.

name: ᛋᚪᛗ ᚻᛁᛞᛖ
description: Large ugly fish plentyful in the cold lands of the North East.People have to desire to name it in the common tounge, they only care for it's good taste

name: Forgorth's Delight
description: As he sat on the Starsteel Throne, Forgorth commanded great quantities of this fish. The original name is forgotten

name: Narflyn
description: Small silver fish with a bright emarld tint. Eaten by many.Some people of the northern mountains have gods in it's image, as it alone carried them the the cold of dark times

name: Therkain
description: Only thing faster than this fish is the speed at which it is eaten.

name: Gleeby Gllorby
description: Gleeby Gllorby is an astronmically slow fish due to it's imposing mass. As a result it is a filling meal even for the greatest of men
